album.title: Silver Side Up / Live at Home (CD & DVD)

wiki.content: This track was made by Nickelback in 2001, The band consists of Chad Kroeger (VOCALS AND GUITAR) , Mike Kroeger (VOCALS AND BASS), Daniel Adair (VOCALS AND DRUMS) and Ryan Peake (VOCALS AND KEYBOARD) According to the How You Remind Me Songfacts, Chad Kroeger wrote the song about his old girlfriend Jodi, who he had a rather dysfunctional relationship with. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: This track was made by Nickelback in 2001, The band consists of Chad Kroeger (VOCALS AND GUITAR) , Mike Kroeger (VOCALS AND BASS), Daniel Adair (VOCALS AND DRUMS) and Ryan Peake (VOCALS AND KEYBOARD) According to the How You Remind Me Songfacts, Chad Kroeger wrote the song about his old girlfriend Jodi, who he had a rather dysfunctional relationship with.

track.name: How You Remind Me
comments: I have so many memories listening to this song ♡
Отличная песня.
EVERY BOTTLE
